page.title: 04The School Summer Social '85
page.content: On July 12th. we are having a social to raise money for the school and to provide a night out for everyone.There will be a{disco}and a{fancy dress. } There will be a{raffle}and{side shows} on the grass. We are having bales to put around the playground. There will be a{barbecue.}Last year about 170 people came. Our Headmaster had to ask them to go home when it got late. If the weather is bad we shall clear the classrooms and canteen and go inside. There will be an awful mess on Saturday morning. We are{raising money}to buy a computer printer,an outdoor store for P.E.stock, a jumping pit,and so we can go to a show at Christmas and Santa Claus will come. We had a lovely dinner last Christmas with all the Governors. The{Friends of the School make a lot of money for us.
